issue.title: [JS] Flaky javascript unittest
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15392](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15392). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See build log: https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4871354453?check_suite_focus=true#step:5:8164

While the error is flaky it occurs pretty often, it would be nice to have fixed. 

Attached a screenshot from the 7.0.0RC1 verification tasks where all of the builds fail due to this issue.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15392?focusedCommentId=17479499) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
It would be also great if we could disable the test case until we have a resolution.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15392?focusedCommentId=17479892) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Just guessing here that the issue originates from https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/js/test/unit/generated-data-tests.ts#L57 since I'm unable to reproduce it locally and the error trace doesn't contain the test case.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15392?focusedCommentId=17480046) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Disabled the test for the 7.0.0 release via https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/f1729a58a8222a18e0f1afc1b6fcf25efb2432aa
